message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.Distributed, cs.PL, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper discusses the security challenges of smart contract platforms and proposes solutions to improve their efficiency and scalability. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper focuses on the parallelization of smart contract computation to improve the performance of blockchain networks. 
- cs.Distributed (Distributed Computing): The paper discusses the distributed nature of blockchain networks and proposes solutions to improve their efficiency and scalability. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper discusses the programming model of smart contracts and proposes solutions to improve their efficiency and scalability. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes solutions to improve the performance and scalability of blockchain systems, which can be seen as control systems.
